languages.text: [Искренне покаяться] "Ты прав — тень скверны моих грехов легла на мою душу. Я хочу изгнать ее с твоей помощью, пока не стало слишком поздно".

traits.locale_text: [Искренне покаяться] "Ты прав — тень скверны легла на мою душу. Я хочу изгнать ее с твоей помощью, пока не стало слишком поздно".

languages.text: [Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."
languages.original_text: [Искренне покаяться] "Ты прав — тень скверны моих грехов легла на мою душу. Я хочу изгнать ее с твоей помощью, пока не стало слишком поздно".

traits.locale_text: [Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of my sins and corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."
[Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of my sins and corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."
[Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of my sins and corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."
[Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of my sins and corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."
[Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of my sins and corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."
[Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."
[Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."

languages.text: [虔诚地忏悔]“你说得对，腐化的阴影笼罩着我的灵魂。我希望能在为时已晚之前，在你的帮助下，驱散这些阴影。”
languages.original_text: [Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."

traits.locale_text: [虔诚地忏悔]“你说得对，罪孽与腐化的阴影笼罩着我的灵魂。我希望能在为时已晚之前，在你的帮助下，驱散这些阴影。”

languages.text: [心から悔やむ]「お前は正しい。{mf|俺|私}の腐敗の影が、魂に追いかぶさっている。手遅れになる前にこの影を追い出すためにも、助けが必要だ」
languages.original_text: [Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."

traits.locale_text: [心から悔やむ]「お前は正しい。{mf|俺|私}の腐敗の影が、魂に追いかぶさっている。手遅れになる前にこの影を追い出すためにも、助けが必要だ」

languages.text: [Arrepentirte sinceramente] «Tiene razón. La sombra de la corrupción ha caído sobre mi alma. Quiero desterrar esa sombra con su ayuda antes de que sea demasiado tarde».
languages.original_text: [Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."

traits.locale_text: [Arrepentirte sinceramente] «Tiene razón. La sombra de mis pecados y mi corrupción ha caído sobre mi alma. Quiero desterrar esa sombra con su ayuda antes de que sea demasiado tarde».

languages.text: [Ehrlich bereuen] "Ihr habt recht. Der Schatten der Verderbnis ist auf meine Seele gefallen. Ich will diesen Schatten mit Eurer Hilfe verbannen, ehe es zu spät ist."
languages.original_text: [Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."

traits.locale_text: [Ehrlich bereuen] "Ihr habt recht. Der Schatten meiner Sünde und meiner Verderbnis ist auf meine Seele gefallen. Ich will diesen Schatten mit Eurer Hilfe verbannen, ehe es zu spät ist."

languages.text: [Vous repentir sincèrement] « Vous avez raison. L'ombre de la corruption s'est abattue sur mon âme. Avec votre aide, je dois bannir ces ténèbres avant qu'il ne soit trop tard. »
languages.original_text: [Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."

traits.locale_text: [Vous repentir sincèrement] « Vous avez raison. L'ombre de mes péchés et de la corruption s'est abattue sur mon âme. Avec votre aide, je dois bannir ces ténèbres avant qu'il ne soit trop tard. »

languages.text: [Samimiyetle pişmanlığını belirt] "Haklısınız. Yozluğun gölgesi, ruhumun üzerine düşmüş. Çok geç olmadan yardımınızla bu gölgeden kurtulmak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: [Repent sincerely] "You are right. The shadow of corruption has fallen on my soul. I want to banish that shadow with your help before it is too late."
